about_the_game:
High in the skies, you take flight in a legendary WWI biplane, the wind whipping through your hair as the propeller spins. But this is no ordinary dogfight. It’s a clash of eras, where the past and future collide.

Historical Showdowns: Engage in thrilling skirmishes against enemy planes from different time periods. From the nimble PT-17 to the sleek F-16 Fighting Falcon, every dogfight is a battle across the ages.

Gold and Glory: When your biplane takes a hit, fear not! Collect gold during each aerial duel, and use it to upgrade to more modern aircraft. Will you choose the agile Messerschmitt or the cutting-edge F-18 Hornet?

Customization Galore: Outfit your planes with air-to-air missiles, gunpods, and other advanced weaponry. Turn your vintage warbird into a high-tech marvel, ready to dominate the skies.

So, buckle up, pilot! The skies await, and history is your battleground. Rise above the clouds, defy time, and become a legend in Time of War - Airstrike.

*Should work with Playstation controllers, but not guaranteed functional yet.

*Game works offline, but needs 1 minute of being online to authentic with steam prior to going offline.
detailed_description:
High in the skies, you take flight in a legendary WWI biplane, the wind whipping through your hair as the propeller spins. But this is no ordinary dogfight. It’s a clash of eras, where the past and future collide.

Historical Showdowns: Engage in thrilling skirmishes against enemy planes from different time periods. From the nimble PT-17 to the sleek F-16 Fighting Falcon, every dogfight is a battle across the ages.

Gold and Glory: When your biplane takes a hit, fear not! Collect gold during each aerial duel, and use it to upgrade to more modern aircraft. Will you choose the agile Messerschmitt or the cutting-edge F-18 Hornet?

Customization Galore: Outfit your planes with air-to-air missiles, gunpods, and other advanced weaponry. Turn your vintage warbird into a high-tech marvel, ready to dominate the skies.

So, buckle up, pilot! The skies await, and history is your battleground. Rise above the clouds, defy time, and become a legend in Time of War - Airstrike.

*Should work with Playstation controllers, but not guaranteed functional yet.

*Game works offline, but needs 1 minute of being online to authentic with steam prior to going offline.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit os
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint 22
  • Processor: i5 - 10th gen or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything better than integrated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5 - 10th gen or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything better than integrated
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Dogfight through time! Upgrade your plane, from biplanes to modern fighter jets. Face off against historical and futuristic foes, and dominate the skies!
